1pctCO2.experiment: 1 percent per year increase in CO2

1pctCO2-4xext.description: branched from 1pctCO2 run at year 140 and run with CO2 fixed at 4x pre-industrial concentration

1pctCO2-bgc.description: Biogeochemically-coupled specified concentration simulation in which CO2 increases at a rate of 1% per year until quadrupling
1pctCO2-bgc.experiment: biogeochemically-coupled version of 1 percent per year increasing CO2 experiment

1pctCO2-cdr.description: 1 percent per year decrease in CO2 (immediately after reaching 4xCO2 in the 1pctCO2 simulation); then held constant at pre-industrial level (part of the CDR-reversibility experiment)
1pctCO2-cdr.experiment: 1 percent per year decrease in CO2 from 4xCO2

1pctCO2-rad.description: Radiatively-coupled specified concentration simulation in which CO2 increases at a rate of 1% per year until quadrupling
1pctCO2-rad.experiment: radiatively-coupled version of 1 percent per year increasing CO2 experiment

1pctCO2Ndep.description: Fully-coupled specified concentration simulation in which CO2 increases at a rate of 1% per year until quadrupling, plus an additional scenario of anthropogenic nitrogen deposition
1pctCO2Ndep.experiment: 1 percent per year increasing CO2 experiment with increasing N-deposition

1pctCO2Ndep-bgc.description: Biogeochemically-coupled specified concentration simulation in which CO2 increases at a rate of 1% per year until quadrupling, plus an additional scenario of anthropogenic nitrogen deposition
1pctCO2Ndep-bgc.experiment: biogeochemically-coupled version of 1 percent per year increasing CO2 experiment with increasing N-deposition

1pctCO2to4x-withism.description: Idealized 1%/yr CO2 increase to 4xC02 over 140yrs and kept constant at 4xCO2 for an additional 200 to 400 yrs simulation that includes interactive ice sheets
1pctCO2to4x-withism.experiment: simulation with interactive ice sheet forced by 1 percent per year increase in CO2 to 4xCO2 (subsequently held fixed)

G1.description: Beginning from a preindustrial control run, simultaneously quadruple the CO2 concentration and reduce the solar constant such that the TOA radiative flux remains within +/m0.1 W/m2
G1.experiment: abrupt quadrupling of CO2 plus reduction in total solar irradiance

G6SST1.description: Time slice at 2020 (ScenarioMIP Tier 1 high forcing scenario)
G6SST1.experiment: SSTs, forcings, and other prescribed conditions from year 2020 of SSP5-8.5

G6SST2-solar.experiment: SSTs from year 2020 of SSP5-8.5; forcings and other prescribed conditions from year 2100 of G6solar

G6SST2-sulfur.experiment: SSTs from year 2020 of SSP5-8.5; forcings and other prescribed conditions from year 2100 of G6sulfur

G6solar.description: Using solar irradiance reduction, return the radiative forcing from a background of the ScenarioMIP high forcing to the ScenarioMIP middle forcing
G6solar.experiment: total solar irradiance reduction to reduce net forcing from SSP585 to SSP245

G6sulfur.description: Using equatorial SO2 injection, return the radiative forcing from a background of the ScenarioMIP high forcing to the ScenarioMIP middle forcing
G6sulfur.experiment: stratospheric sulfate aerosol injection to reduce net forcing from SSP585 to SSP245

G7SST1-cirrus.description: Time slice at 2020 (ScenarioMIP Tier 1 high forcing scenario and cirrus thinning according to G7cirrus)
G7SST1-cirrus.experiment: SSTs from year 2020 of SSP5-8.5; forcings and other prescribed conditions from year 2020 of SSP5-8.5 and cirrus thinning

G7SST2-cirrus.description: Time slice at 2100 (ScenarioMIP Tier 1 high forcing scenario and cirrus thinning according to G7cirrus)
G7SST2-cirrus.experiment: SSTs from year 2100 of SSP5-8.5; forcings and other prescribed conditions from year 2100 of G7cirrus

G7cirrus.description: Against a background of the ScenarioMIP high forcing, reduce cirrus cloud optical depth by a constant amount
G7cirrus.experiment: increase cirrus ice crystal fall speed to reduce net forcing in SSP585 by 1 W m-2

a4SST.description: As piSST, but with monthly-varying SSTs taken from years 111-140 of each model's own abrupt-4xCO2 experiment instead of from piControl. Sea-ice is unchanged from piSST
a4SST.experiment: as piSST but with SSTs from abrupt-4xCO2

a4SSTice.description: As piSST, but with monthly-varying SSTs and sea-ice taken from years 111-140 of each model's own abrupt-4xCO2 experiment instead of from piControl
a4SSTice.experiment: as piSST but with SSTs and sea ice from abrupt-4xCO2

a4SSTice-4xCO2.description: As a4SSTice, but CO2 is quadrupled, and the increase in CO2 is seen by both the radiation scheme and vegetation
a4SSTice-4xCO2.experiment: as piSST but with SSTs and sea ice from abrupt-4xCO2, and 4xCO2 seen by radiation and vegetation

abrupt-0p5xCO2.description: Identical to the DECK abrupt-4xCO2, but at 0.5xCO2

abrupt-2xCO2.description: Identical to the DECK abrupt-4xCO2, but at 2xCO2

abrupt-solm4p.description: Conceptually similar to abrupt 4xCO2 DECK experiment, except that the solar constant rather than CO2 is abruptly reduced by 4%

abrupt-solp4p.description: Conceptually similar to abrupt 4xCO2 DECK experiment, except that the solar constant rather than CO2 is abruptly increased by 4%

amip-4xCO2.description: As CMIP5/CFMIP-2 amip4xCO2 experiment. AMIP experiment where SSTs are held at control values and the CO2 seen by the radiation scheme is quadrupled

amip-TIP.description: The topography of the TIP is modified by setting surface elevations to 500m; to understand the combined thermal and mechanical forcing of the TIP. Same model as DECK
amip-TIP.experiment: same as "amip" run, but surface elevations of the Tibetan-Iranian Plateau and Himalayas reduced to 500m

amip-TIP-nosh.description: Surface sensible heat released at the elevation above 500m over the TIP is not allowed to heat the atmosphere. Same model as DECK
amip-TIP-nosh.experiment: same as "amip" run, but sensible heat not allowed for elevations of the Tibetan-Iranian Plateau and Himalayas above 500m

amip-a4SST-4xCO2.description: Same as amip, but a patterned SST anomaly is applied on top of the monthly-varying amip SSTs. This anomaly is a monthly climatology, taken from each model's own abrupt-4xCO2 run minus piControl (using the mean of years 111-140 of abrupt-4xCO2, and the parallel 30-year section of piControl). CO2 is quadrupled, and the increase in CO2 is seen by both the radiation scheme and vegetation
amip-a4SST-4xCO2.experiment: as AMIP but with warming pattern from abrupt-4xCO2 added to SSTs and 4xCO2 seen by radiation and vegetation

amip-climSIC.description: PA5.2: investigate role of transient SST in recent climate change

amip-climSST.description: PA5.1: investigate role of transient sea ice in recent climate change

amip-future4K.description: As CMIP5/CFMIP-2 amipFuture experiment. AMIP experiment where SSTs are subject to a composite SST warming pattern derived from coupled models, scaled to an ice-free ocean mean of 4K

amip-hist.description: Extended AMIP run that covers 1870-2014. All natural and anthropogenic historical forcings as used in CMIP6 Historical Simulation will be included. AGCM resolution as CMIP6 Historical Simulation. The HadISST data will be used

amip-hld.description: The topography of the highlands in Africa, N. America and S. America TP is modified by setting surface elevations to a certain height (500m). Same model as DECK
amip-hld.experiment: same as "amip" run, but surface elevations of the East African Highlands in Africa, Sierra Madre in N. America and Andes in S. America reduced to 500m

amip-lfmip-pObs.experiment: prescribed land (from pseudo-observations) and AMIP SSTs

amip-lfmip-pdLC.description: Prescribed land conditions 1980-2014 climate; AMIP SSTs
amip-lfmip-pdLC.experiment: prescribed land (from current climatology) and AMIP SSTs

amip-lfmip-rmLC.description: Prescribed land conditions 30yr running mean; AMIP SSTs
amip-lfmip-rmLC.experiment: prescribed land conditions (from running mean climatology) and AMIP SSTs

amip-lwoff.description: As amip experiment, but with cloud-radiative effects switched off in the LW radiation code
amip-lwoff.experiment: AMIP experiment with longwave cloud-radiative effects off

amip-m4K.description: As amip experiment but SSTs are subject to a uniform cooling of 4K

amip-p4K.description: As CMIP5/CFMIP-2 amip4K experiment. AMIP experiment where SSTs are subject to a uniform warming of 4K

amip-p4K-lwoff.description: As amip-p4K experiment, but with cloud-radiative effects switched off in the LW radiation code
amip-p4K-lwoff.experiment: AMIP experiment with uniform 4K SST increase and with longwave cloud radiative effects off

amip-piForcing.description: Identical to standard AMIP experiment but from 1870-present with constant pre-industrial forcing levels (anthropogenic and natural)
amip-piForcing.experiment: AMIP SSTs with pre-industrial anthropogenic and natural forcing

aqua-4xCO2.description: Extended version of CMIP5/CFMIP-2 aqua4xCO2 experiment. Aquaplanet experiment where SSTs are held at control values and the CO2 seen by the radiation scheme is quadrupled

aqua-control.description: Extended version of CMIP5/CFMIP-2 aquaControl experiment. Aquaplanet (no land) experiment with no seasonal cycle forced with specified zonally symmetric SSTs

aqua-control-lwoff.description: As aqua-control experiment, but with cloud-radiative effects switched off in the LW radiation code
aqua-control-lwoff.experiment: aquaplanet control with longwave cloud radiative effects off

aqua-p4K.description: Extended version of CMIP5/CFMIP-2 aqua4K experiment. Aquaplanet experiment where SSTs are subject to a uniform warming of 4K

aqua-p4K-lwoff.description: As aqua-p4K experiment, but with cloud-radiative effects switched off in the LW radiation code
aqua-p4K-lwoff.experiment: aquaplanet with uniform 4K SST increase and with longwave cloud radiative effects off

control-1950.experiment: coupled control with fixed 1950's forcing (HighResMIP equivalent of pre-industrial control)

dcppA-assim.description: A2.3 Assimilation runs used to generate initial conditions for hindcasts
dcppA-assim.experiment: Assimilation run paralleling the historical simulation, which may be used to generate hindcast initial conditions

dcppA-hindcast.description: A1 (and A2.1, A3.1, and A3.2) Decadal hindcasts begun near the end of each year from 1960 to 2016, or every other year at minimum. First full hindcast year follows start year (e.g., for s1960, first full hindcast year is 1961)
dcppA-hindcast.experiment: hindcast initialized based on observations and using historical forcing

dcppA-hindcast-niff.description: A4.1 Decadal hindcasts begun near the end of each year from 1960 to 2016, or every other year at minimum, but with no information from the future. First full hindcast year follows start year (e.g., for s1960, first full hindcast year is 1961)
dcppA-hindcast-niff.experiment: hindcast initialized based on observations but without using knowledge of subsequent historical forcing

dcppA-historical-niff.description: A4.2 Hindcasts initialized from historical climate simulations as in DCPP-A2.2, but with no information from the future. First full hindcast year follows start year (e.g., for s1960, first full hindcast year is 1961)
dcppA-historical-niff.experiment: hindcast initialized from historical climate simulation but without using knowledge of subsequent historical forcing

dcppB-forecast.description: B1 (and B2.1, B2.2) Ongoing decadal forecasts. First full forecast year follows start year (e.g., for s2017, first full forecast year is 2018)
dcppB-forecast.experiment: forecast initialized from observations with forcing from ssp245

dcppC-amv-ExTrop-neg.description: C1.7 Mechanisms and predictability of the hiatus and of similar long timescale variations of both signs
dcppC-amv-ExTrop-neg.experiment: Idealized climate impact of negative extratropical AMV anomaly pattern

dcppC-amv-ExTrop-pos.description: C1.7Mechanisms and predictability of the hiatus and of similar long timescale variations of both signs
dcppC-amv-ExTrop-pos.experiment: Idealized climate impact of positive extratropical AMV anomaly pattern

dcppC-amv-Trop-neg.description: C1.8 Mechanisms and predictability of the hiatus and of similar long timescale variations of both signs
dcppC-amv-Trop-neg.experiment: Idealized climate impact of negative tropical AMV anomaly pattern

dcppC-amv-Trop-pos.description: C1.8 Mechanisms and predictability of the hiatus and of similar long timescale variations of both signs
dcppC-amv-Trop-pos.experiment: idealized positive tropical AMV anomaly pattern

dcppC-amv-neg.description: C1.3 Mechanisms and predictability of the hiatus and of similar long timescale variations of both signs
dcppC-amv-neg.experiment: Idealized climate impact of negative AMV anomaly pattern

dcppC-amv-pos.description: C1.2 Mechanisms and predictability of the hiatus and of similar long timescale variations of both signs
dcppC-amv-pos.experiment: Idealized climate impact of positive AMV anomaly pattern

dcppC-atl-control.description: C1.1 Mechanisms and predictability of the hiatus and of similar long timescale variations of both signs

dcppC-atl-pacemaker.description: C1.11 Mechanisms and predictability of the hiatus and of similar long timescale variations of both signs

dcppC-atl-spg.description: C2.1 (and C2.2) Mechanisms and predictability of the hiatus and of similar long timescale variations of both signs. First full hindcast year follows start year (e.g., for s1992, first full hindcast year is 1993)
dcppC-atl-spg.experiment: predictability of 1990s warming of Atlantic sub-polar gyre

dcppC-forecast-addAgung.description: C3.4 Effects of volcanoes on decadal prediction and predictability of forced and internal variability components. First full hindcast year is 2015

dcppC-forecast-addElChichon.description: C3.5 Effects of volcanoes on decadal prediction and predictability of forced and internal variability components. First full hindcast year is 2015
dcppC-forecast-addElChichon.experiment: 2015 forecast with added El Chichon forcing

dcppC-forecast-addPinatubo.description: C3.6 Effects of volcanoes on decadal prediction and predictability of forced and internal variability components. First full hindcast year is 2015

dcppC-hindcast-noAgung.description: C3.3 Effects of volcanoes on decadal prediction and predictability of forced and internal variability components. First full hindcast year is 1962
dcppC-hindcast-noAgung.experiment: hindcast but with only background volcanic forcing to be the same as that used in the 2015 forecast

dcppC-hindcast-noElChichon.description: C3.2 Effects of volcanoes on decadal prediction and predictability of forced and internal variability components. First full hindcast year is 1982
dcppC-hindcast-noElChichon.experiment: hindcast but with only background volcanic forcing to be the same as that used in the 2015 forecast

dcppC-hindcast-noPinatubo.description: C3.1 Effects of volcanoes on decadal prediction and predictability of forced and internal variability components. First full hindcast year is 1991
dcppC-hindcast-noPinatubo.experiment: hindcast but with only background volcanic forcing to be the same as that used in the 2015 forecast

dcppC-ipv-NexTrop-neg.description: C1.9 and predictability of the hiatus and of similar long timescale variations of both signs
dcppC-ipv-NexTrop-neg.experiment: idealized negative northern extratropical IPV anomaly pattern

dcppC-ipv-NexTrop-pos.description: C1.9 Mechanisms and predictability of the hiatus and of similar long timescale variations of both signs
dcppC-ipv-NexTrop-pos.experiment: idealized positive northern extratropical IPV anomaly pattern

dcppC-ipv-neg.description: C1.6 Mechanisms and predictability of the hiatus and of similar long timescale variations of both signs

dcppC-ipv-pos.description: C1.5 Mechanisms and predictability of the hiatus and of similar long timescale variations of both signs

dcppC-pac-control.description: C1.4 Mechanisms and predictability of the hiatus and of similar long timescale variations of both signs

dcppC-pac-pacemaker.description: C1.10 Mechanisms and predictability of the hiatus and of similar long timescale variations of both signs. First full hindcast year is 2015

deforest-globe.description: Idealized deforestation experiment, 20 million km2 forest removed linearly over a period of 50 years, with an additional 30 years with no specified change in forest cover; all other forcings held constant

esm-hist.experiment: all-forcing simulation of the recent past with atmospheric CO2 concentration calculated

esm-hist-ext.description: Extension beyond 2014 of the CMIP6 historical (CO2 emission-driven)
esm-hist-ext.experiment: post-2014 all-forcing simulation with atmospheric CO2 concentration calculated

esm-pi-CO2pulse.description: 100 Gt C instantly added (positive pulse) to a pre-industrial atmosphere (part of the CDR-pi-pulse experiment)
esm-pi-CO2pulse.experiment: pulse addition of 100 Gt carbon to pre-industrial atmosphere

esm-pi-cdr-pulse.description: 100 Gt C instantly removed (negative pulse) from a pre-industrial atmosphere (part of the CDR-pi-pulse experiment)
esm-pi-cdr-pulse.experiment: pulse removal of 100 Gt carbon from pre-industrial atmosphere

esm-piControl.experiment: pre-industrial control simulation with CO2 concentration calculated

esm-piControl-spinup.description: DECK: spin-up portion of the control (emission-driven)
esm-piControl-spinup.experiment: pre-industrial control simulation with CO2 concentration calculated (spin-up)

esm-ssp534-over.description: CO2 emissions driven SSP5-3.4 overshoot scenario simulation optionally extending to year 2300 (part of the CDR-overshoot experiment)

esm-ssp585-ocn-alk.description: emission driven SSP5-8.5 scenario with 0.14 Pmol/yr alkalinity added to ice free ocean surface waters from 2020 optionally extended from 2100 to 2300 (part of the CDR-ocean-alk experiment)
esm-ssp585-ocn-alk.experiment: emission-driven SSP5-8.5 scenario but with ocean alkalinization from year 2020 onward

esm-ssp585-ocn-alk-stop.description: Simulation of abrupt termination of ocean alkalinsation in 2070 during an emission driven SSP5-8.5 scenario (part of the CDR-ocean-alk experiment)
esm-ssp585-ocn-alk-stop.experiment: emission-driven SSP5-8.5 scenario with alkalinization terminated in year 2070

esm-ssp585-ssp126Lu.description: Additional land use policy sensitivity simulation for high radiative forcing scenario, keep all forcings the same as in C4MIP esmssp5-8.5 scenario except use SSP1-2.6 land use; emission driven
esm-ssp585-ssp126Lu.experiment: emissions-driven SSP5-8.5 with SSP1-2.6 land use

esm-ssp585-ssp126Lu-ext.description: Long term extension of CO2 emissions driven SSP5-8.5 with SSP1-2.6 land use forcing (part of the CDR-afforestation experiment)
esm-ssp585-ssp126Lu-ext.experiment: extension of the LUMIP emissions-driven simulation following SSP5-8.5 with SSP1-2.6 land use

esm-ssp585ext.description: Long term extension of CO2 emissions driven SSP5-8.5 scenario (used in the CDR-afforestation and CDR-ocean-alk experiments)
esm-ssp585ext.experiment: emission-driven long-term extension of the SSP5-8.5 scenario

esm-yr2010CO2-CO2pulse.description: Upon initialization from end of year 2015 of esm-yr2010CO2-control instantaneously introduce 100 Gt C ("positive pulse"; part of the CDR-yr2010-pulse experiment)
esm-yr2010CO2-CO2pulse.experiment: instantaneous 100 Gt C addition to an industrial era atmosphere

esm-yr2010CO2-cdr-pulse.description: Upon initialization from end of year 2015 of esm-yr2010CO2-control instantaneously remove 100 Gt C ("negative pulse"; part of the CDR-yr2010-pulse experiment
esm-yr2010CO2-cdr-pulse.experiment: instantaneous 100 Gt C removal from industrial era atmosphere

esm-yr2010CO2-control.description: Forced with CO2 emissions diagnosed from historical and yr2010CO2 simulations and all other forcings the same as in that simulation (part of the CDR-yr2010-pulse experiment)
esm-yr2010CO2-control.experiment: historical emissions followed by fixed 2010 emissions (both model-diagnosed)

esm-yr2010CO2-noemit.description: Upon initialization from end of year 2015 of esm-yr2010-control CO2 emissions are fixed at zero; all other forcing fixed at 2010 level (part of the CDR-yr2010-pulse experiment)
esm-yr2010CO2-noemit.experiment: branches from esm-yr2010CO2-control with zero emissions

faf-all.description: 1xCO2 experiment, parallel to piControl, forced over the ocean simultaneously by surface windstress (as in the wind experiment), net heat flux (as in the heat experiment) and net freshwater flux (as in the water experiment) anomalies obtained from the CMIP5 ensemble mean of 1pctCO2 experiments at the time of 2xCO2, using a passive tracer to prevent negative climate feedback on the heat flux applied
faf-all.experiment: control plus perturbative surface fluxes of momentum, heat and water into ocean

faf-heat.description: 1xCO2 experiment, parallel to piControl, forced over the ocean by surface net heat flux anomalies obtained from the CMIP5 ensemble mean of 1pctCO2 experiments at the time of 2xCO2, using a passive tracer to prevent negative climate feedback on the heat flux applied
faf-heat.experiment: control plus perturbative surface flux of heat into ocean

faf-passiveheat.description: 1xCO2 experiment, parallel to piControl, with a flux of passive tracer added at the ocean surface at the same rate as the surface net heat flux anomaly applied in the FAFMIP heat experiment
faf-passiveheat.experiment: control plus surface flux of passive heat tracer into ocean

faf-stress.description: 1xCO2 experiment, parallel to piControl, forced over the ocean by surface windstress anomalies obtained from the CMIP5 ensemble mean of 1pctCO2 experiments at the time of 2xCO2
faf-stress.experiment: control plus perturbative surface flux of momentum into ocean

faf-water.description: 1xCO2 experiment, parallel to piControl, forced over the ocean by surface net freshwater flux anomalies obtained from the CMIP5 ensemble mean of 1pctCO2 experiments at the time of 2xCO2
faf-water.experiment: control plus perturbative surface flux of water into ocean

futSST-pdSIC.description: PA1.4: investigate role of SST in polar amplification
futSST-pdSIC.experiment: Atmosphere time slice with future SST and present day SIC

futureSST-4xCO2-solar.description: Time slice at year 100 of G1ext to examine radiative forcing of abrupt-4xCO2 and G1
futureSST-4xCO2-solar.experiment: year 100 SSTs from abrupt-4xCO2 with quadrupled CO2 and solar reduction

highres-future.description: Coupled integrations with SSP5 forcing (nearest to CMIP5 RCP8.5 (as in highresSST-future)
highres-future.experiment: coupled future 2015-2050 using a scenario as close to CMIP5 RCP8.5 as possible within CMIP6

highresSST-4xCO2.description: Similar to CFMIP amip-4xCO2, SSTs are held at highresSST-present values and the CO2 seen by the radiation scheme is quadrupled

highresSST-LAI.description: Forced global atmosphere-land simulations as highresSST-present, but using an common LAI dataset across models
highresSST-LAI.experiment: common LAI dataset within the highresSST-present experiment

highresSST-future.description: Extend highresSST-present to 2050 with agreed SSP5/RCP8.5 forcings (with option to extend further to 2100)
highresSST-future.experiment: forced atmosphere experiment for 2015-2050 using SST/sea-ice derived from CMIP5 RCP8.5 simulations and a scenario as close to RCP8.5 as possible within CMIP6

highresSST-p4K.description: Similar to CFMIP amip-p4K, add a uniform warming of 4K to highresSST-present SSTs and run the experiment parallel to highresSST-present

highresSST-present.description: Forced global atmosphere-land simulations using daily 1/4 degree SST and sea-ice forcings, and aerosol optical properties (not emissions) to constrain model spread

highresSST-smoothed.description: Forced global atmosphere-land simulations as highresSST-present, but using smoothed SST to investigate impact of SST variability

hist-1950.description: Coupled integrationswith historic external forcings (as in highresSST-present)

hist-1950HC.description: Historical WMGHG concentrations and NTCF emissions, 1950 halocarbon concentrations, start 1950
hist-1950HC.experiment: historical forcing, but with1950s halocarbon concentrations; initialized in 1950

hist-GHG.description: Historical well-mixed GHG-only run. Models with interactive chemistry schemes should either turn off the chemistry or use a preindustrial climatology of stratospheric and tropospheric ozone in their radiation schemes. This will ensure that ozone is fixed in all these simulations, and simulated responses in models with and without coupled chemistry are comparable

hist-all-aer2.description: Historical ALL forcing run with alternate estimates of aerosol concentrations/emissions
hist-all-aer2.experiment: historical ALL-forcing run with alternate estimates of aerosol forcing

hist-all-nat2.description: Historical ALL forcing run with alternates estimate of solar and volcanic forcing
hist-all-nat2.experiment: historical ALL-forcing run with alternate estimates of natural forcing

hist-bgc.experiment: biogeochemically-coupled version of the simulation of the recent past with CO2 concentration prescribed

hist-noLu.description: Same as CMIP6 historical but with land cover held at 1850, no human activity; concentration driven

hist-piAer.description: Historical WMGHG, halocarbon concentrations and O3 precursor emissions, 1850 aerosol precursor emissions
hist-piAer.experiment: historical forcing, but with pre-industrial aerosol emissions

hist-piNTCF.description: Historical WMGHG and halocarbons concentrations, 1850 NTCF emissions
hist-piNTCF.experiment: historical forcing, but with pre-industrial NTCF emissions

hist-resAMO.description: Pacemaker 20th century historical run that includes all forcing as used in CMIP6 Historical Simulation, and the observational historical SST is restored in the AMO domain (0deg-70degN, 70degW-0deg)
hist-resAMO.experiment: initialized from "historical" run year 1870 and SSTs in the AMO domain (0deg-70degN, 70degW-0deg) restored to AMIP SSTs with historical forcings

hist-resIPO.description: Pacemaker 20th century historical run that includes all forcing as used in CMIP6 Historical Simulation, and the observational historical SST is restored in the tropical lobe of the IPO domain (20degS-20degN, 175degE-75degW)
hist-resIPO.experiment: initialized from "historical" run year 1870 and SSTs in tropical lobe of the IPO domain (20degS-20degN, 175degE-75degW) restored to AMIP SSTs with historical forcings

hist-sol.description: Historical solar-only transient simulation using settings from CMIP6 historical simulation but fixed GHG and ODS (1850 level)

hist-spAer-aer.description: Prescribed anthropogenic aerosol optical properties. Changes in aerosols only
hist-spAer-aer.experiment: historical simulation with specified anthropogenic aerosols, no other forcings

hist-spAer-all.description: Prescribed anthropogenic aerosol optical properties. All forcings
hist-spAer-all.experiment: historical simulation with specified anthropogenic aerosols

hist-stratO3.description: Historical stratospheric-ozone-only. In models with coupled chemistry, the chemistry scheme should be turned off, and the simulated ensemble mean monthly mean 3D stratospheric ozone concentrations from the CMIP6 historical simulations should be prescribed. Tropospheric ozone should be fixed at 3D long-term monthly mean piControl values, with a value of 100 ppbv ozone concentration in this piControl climatology used to separate the troposphere from the stratosphere. In models without coupled chemistry the same stratospheric ozone prescribed in the CMIP6 historical simulations should be prescribed. Stratospheric ozone concentrations will be provided by CCMI

histSST.description: Historical transient with SSTs prescribed from historical
histSST.experiment: historical prescribed SSTs and historical forcing

histSST-1950HC.description: Historical WMGHG concentrations and NTCF emissions, 1950 halocarbon concentrations
histSST-1950HC.experiment: historical SSTs and historical forcing, but with1950 halocarbon concentrations

histSST-piAer.description: Historical WMGHG, halocarbon concentrations and tropospheric ozone precursors emissions, 1850 aerosol precursor emissions, prescribed SSTs
histSST-piAer.experiment: historical SSTs and historical forcing, but with pre-industrial aerosol emissions

histSST-piCH4.description: Historical (non-CH4) WMGHG concentrations and NTCF emissions, 1850 CH4 concentrations
histSST-piCH4.experiment: historical SSTs and historical forcing, but with pre-industrial methane concentrations

histSST-piN2O.description: Historical (non-N2O) WMGHG concentrations and NTCF emissions, 1850 N2O concentrations
histSST-piN2O.experiment: historical SSTs and historical forcings, but with pre-industrial N2O concentrations

histSST-piNTCF.description: Historical WMGHG concentrations and halocarbons emissions, 1850 NTCF emissions, prescribed SSTs
histSST-piNTCF.experiment: historical SSTs and historical forcing, but with pre-industrial NTCF emissions

histSST-piO3.description: Historical WMGHG, halocarbon concentrations and aerosol precursor emissions, 1850 tropospheric ozone precursors emissions, prescribed SSTs
histSST-piO3.experiment: historical SSTs and historical forcing, but with pre-industrial ozone precursor emissions

historical.experiment: all-forcing simulation of the recent past

historical-ext.description: Extension beyond 2014 of the CMIP6 historical

historical-withism.description: Historical simulation that includes interactive ice sheets. Set up follows the historical experiment

ism-1pctCO2to4x-self.description: Idealized 1%/yr CO2 increase to 4xC02 over 140yrs and kept constant at 4xCO2 for an additional 200 to 400 yrs simulation with ice sheets forced "offline" with DECK 1pctCO2 using forcing from its own AOGCM
ism-1pctCO2to4x-self.experiment: offline ice sheet model forced by ISM's own AOGCM 1pctCO2to4x output

ism-1pctCO2to4x-std.description: Idealized 1%/yr CO2 increase to 4xC02 over 140yrs and kept constant at 4xCO2 for an additional 200 to 400 yrs simulation with ice sheets forced "offline" with DECK 1pctCO2 using a standard forcing
ism-1pctCO2to4x-std.experiment: offline ice sheet model forced by ISMIP6-specified AOGCM 1pctCO2to4x output

ism-amip-std.description: Offline ice sheet evolution for the last few decades forced by amip
ism-amip-std.experiment: offline ice sheet forced by ISMIP6-specified AGCM AMIP output

ism-asmb-std.description: Offline ice sheet simulation with synthetic atmospheric dataset to explore the uncertainty in sea level due to ice sheet initialization
ism-asmb-std.experiment: offline ice sheet forced by initMIP synthetic atmospheric experiment

ism-bsmb-std.description: Offline ice sheet simulation with synthetic oceanic dataset to explore the uncertainty in sea level due to ice sheet initialization
ism-bsmb-std.experiment: offline ice sheet forced by initMIP synthetic oceanic experiment

ism-ctrl-std.description: Offline ice sheet control run for the initMIP experiment that explores the uncertainty in sea level due to ice sheet initialization
ism-ctrl-std.experiment: offline ice sheet model initMIP control

ism-historical-self.description: Historical simulation using "offline" ice sheet models. Forcing for ice sheet model is from its own AOGCM
ism-historical-self.experiment: offline ice sheet forced by ISM's own AOGCM historical output

ism-historical-std.description: Historical simulation using "offline" ice sheet models. Forcing for ice sheet model is the standard dataset based on CMIP6 AOGCM historical
ism-historical-std.experiment: offline ice sheet forced by ISMIP6-specified AOGCM historical output

ism-lig127k-std.description: Last interglacial simulation of ice sheet evolution driven by PMIP lig127k
ism-lig127k-std.experiment: offline ice sheet forced by ISMIP6-specified AGCM last interglacial output

ism-pdControl-std.description: Present-day control simulation for "offline" ice sheets
ism-pdControl-std.experiment: offline ice sheet forced by ISMIP6-specified AOGCM pdControl output

ism-piControl-self.description: Pre-industrial control simulation for "offline" ice sheets
ism-piControl-self.experiment: offline ice sheet forced by ISM's own AOGCM piControl output

ism-ssp585-self.description: Future climate ScenarioMIP SSP5-8.5 simulation using "offline" ice sheet models. Forcing for ice sheet model is from its own AOGCM
ism-ssp585-self.experiment: offline ice sheet forced by ISM's own AOGCM ssp585 output

ism-ssp585-std.description: Future climate ScenarioMIP SSP5-8.5 simulation using "offline" ice sheet models. Forcing for ice sheet model is the standard dataset based on ScenarioMIP ssp585
ism-ssp585-std.experiment: offline ice sheet forced by ISMIP6-specified AOGCM ssp585 output

land-cCO2.description: Same as land-hist except with CO2 held constant

land-cClim.description: Same as land-hist except with climate held constant

land-crop-grass.description: Same as land-hist but with all new crop and pastureland treated as unmanaged grassland
land-crop-grass.experiment: historical land-only with cropland as natural grassland

land-crop-noFert.description: Same as land-hist but with fertilization rates and area held at 1850 levels/distribution

land-crop-noIrrig.description: Same as land-hist but with irrigated area held at 1850 levels

land-crop-noIrrigFert.description: Same as land-hist except with plants in cropland area utilizing at least some form of crop management (e.g., planting and harvesting) rather than simulating cropland vegetation as a natural grassland. Irrigated area and fertilizer area/use should be held constant
land-crop-noIrrigFert.experiment: historical land-only with managed crops but with irrigation and fertilization held constant

land-hist-altLu2.experiment: historical land-only alternate land use history

land-hist-altStartYear.description: Same as land-hist except starting from either 1700 (for models that typically start in 1850) or 1850 (for models that typically start in 1700)

land-noFire.description: Same as land-hist but with anthropogenic ignition and suppression held to 1850 levels
land-noFire.experiment: historical land-only with no human fire management

land-noLu.description: Same as land-hist except no land-use change
land-noLu.experiment: historical land-only with no land-use change

land-noPasture.description: Same as land-hist but with grazing and other management on pastureland held at 1850 levels/distribution, i.e. all new pastureland is treated as unmanaged grassland (as in land-crop-grass)

land-noShiftCultivate.description: Same as land-hist except shifting cultivation turned off. An additional LUC transitions dataset will be provided as a data layer within LUMIP LUH2 dataset with shifting cultivation deactivated
land-noShiftCultivate.experiment: historical land-only with shifting cultivation turned off

land-noWoodHarv.description: Same as land-hist but with wood harvest maintained at 1850 amounts/areas
land-noWoodHarv.experiment: historical land-only with no wood harvest

lfmip-initLC.experiment: initialized from "historical" run year 1980, but with land conditions initialized from pseudo-observations

lfmip-pdLC.experiment: prescribed land conditions (from current climate climatology) and initialized from "historical" run year 1980

lfmip-pdLC-cruNcep.description: Prescribed land conditions 1980-2014 climate with Land-Hist-cruNcep

lfmip-pdLC-princeton.description: Prescribed land conditions 1980-2014 climate with Land-Hist-princeton

lfmip-pdLC-wfdei.description: Prescribed land conditions 1980-2014 climate with Land-Hist-wfdei

lfmip-rmLC.experiment: prescribed land conditions (from running mean climatology) and initialized from "historical" run year 1980

lfmip-rmLC-cruNcep.description: Prescribed land conditions 30yr running mean with Land-Hist-cruNcep

lfmip-rmLC-princeton.description: Prescribed land conditions 30yr running mean with Land-Hist-princeton

lfmip-rmLC-wfdei.description: Prescribed land conditions 30yr running mean with Land-Hist-wfdei

lgm.description: main forcings: ice-sheet; trace gases, astronomical parameters, dust (forcing, or feedback if dust cycle represented in model)

lig127k.description: main forcings: astronomical parameters, trace gases, dust (forcing, or feedback if dust cycle represented in model)

midHolocene.description: main forcings: trace gases, orbital parameters, dust (forcing, or feedback if dust cycle represented in model)

midPliocene-eoi400.description: main forcings: trace gases, orography, ice-sheet

modelSST-futArcSIC.description: PA4.2: investigate role of background state in response to Arctic sea ice
modelSST-futArcSIC.experiment: Atmosphere time slice with present day coupled model SST and future Arctic SIC

modelSST-pdSIC.description: PA4.1: atmosphere only model present day control with coupled model SST
modelSST-pdSIC.experiment: Atmosphere time slice present day control with coupled model SST

omip1.description: Global ocean - sea-ice coupled experiment forced with the Coordinated Ocean - ice Reference Experiments inter-annually varying atmospheric and river data sets for years 1948-2009. Initial ocean tracer fields are based on observations. All Priority=1 OMIP diagnostics are requested for all five cycles of the 62-year forcing to quantify drift. All OMIP diagnostics (Priority=1,2,3) are requested for the 5th cycle
omip1.experiment: OMIP experiment forced by Large and Yeager (CORE-2, NCEP) atmospheric data set and initialized with observed physical and biogeochemical ocean data

omip1-spunup.description: Same as the omip1 experiment except that it is not initialized with observed climatologies; rather it is initialized with results from at least a 2000-year spin up of the coupled physical-biogeochemical models. The spin up simulations may be made with the classic online or offline approach, or with tracer-acceleration techniques or fast solvers. If an online approach is used, at the end of the 5th cycle of CORE-II forcing, the model's physical fields should be reinitialized to the values at the start of the 3rd cycle in order to avoid long-term drift in those fields and to assure that they will not diverge greatly from physical fields in the omip1 simulation. The spin up also includes radiocarbon to evaluate deep-ocean circulation
omip1-spunup.experiment: OMIP experiment forced by Large and Yeager (CORE-2, NCEP) atmospheric data set and initialized from at least a 2000-year spin up of the coupled physical-biogeochemical model

omip2.description: Global ocean - sea-ice coupled experiment forced with the JRA55-do inter-annually varying atmospheric and river data sets for years 1958-2017. Initial ocean tracer fields are based on observations. All Priority=1 OMIP diagnostics are requested for all five cycles of the 59-year forcing to quantify drift. All OMIP diagnostics (Priority=1,2,3) are requested for the 5th cycle
omip2.experiment: OMIP experiment forced by JRA55-do atmospheric data set and initialized with observed physical and biogeochemical ocean data

omip2-spunup.description: Same as the omip2 experiment except that it is not initialized with observed climatologies; rather it is initialized with results from at least a 2000-year spin up of the coupled physical-biogeochemical models. The spin up simulations may be made with the classic online or offline approach, or with tracer-acceleration techniques or fast solvers. If an online approach is used, at the end of the 5th cycle ofthe JRA55-do forcing, the model's physical fields should be reinitialized to the values at the start of the 3rd cycle in order to avoid long-term drift in those fields and to assure that they will not diverge greatly from physical fields in the omip2 simulation. The spin up also includes radiocarbon to evaluate deep-ocean circulation
omip2-spunup.experiment: OMIP experiment forced by JRA55-do atmospheric data set and initialized from at least a 2000-year spin up of the coupled physical-biogeochemical model

pa-futAntSIC.description: PA2.5: investigate response to Antarctic sea ice in coupled model
pa-futAntSIC.experiment: Partially-coupled time slice constrained by future Antarctic SIC

pa-futAntSIC-ext.description: PA6.2: investigate decadal and longer timescale response to Antarctic sea ice
pa-futAntSIC-ext.experiment: Partially-coupled extended simulation with future Antarctic SIC

pa-futArcSIC.description: PA2.3: investigate response to Arctic sea ice in coupled model
pa-futArcSIC.experiment: Partially-coupled time slice constrained by future Arctic SIC

pa-futArcSIC-ext.description: PA6.2: investigate decadal and longer timescale response to Arctic sea ice
pa-futArcSIC-ext.experiment: Partially-coupled extended simulation with future Arctic SIC

pa-pdSIC.description: PA2.1: coupled model present day control constrained by oberved sea ice
pa-pdSIC.experiment: Partially-coupled time slice contrained by present day SIC

pa-pdSIC-ext.description: PA6.1: centennial coupled model present day control constrained by oberved sea ice
pa-pdSIC-ext.experiment: Partially-coupled extended simulation constrained by present day SIC

pa-piAntSIC.description: PA2.4: investigate response to Antarctic sea ice in coupled model
pa-piAntSIC.experiment: Partially-coupled time slice with pre-industrial Antarctic SIC

pa-piArcSIC.description: PA2.2: investigate response to Arctic sea ice in coupled model
pa-piArcSIC.experiment: Partially-coupled time slice constrained by pre-industrial Arctic SIC

past1000.description: main forcings: trace gases, volcanoes, solar variability, land use

pdSST-futAntSIC.description: PA1.8: investigate response to Antarctic sea ice and its role in polar amplification
pdSST-futAntSIC.experiment: Atmosphere time slice with present day SST and future Antarctic SIC

pdSST-futArcSIC.description: PA1.6: investigate response to Arctic sea ice and its role in polar amplification
pdSST-futArcSIC.experiment: Atmosphere time slice with present day SST and future Arctic SIC

pdSST-futArcSICSIT.description: PA1.10: investigate role of sea ice thickness in response to Arctic sea ice
pdSST-futArcSICSIT.experiment: Atmosphere time slice with present day SST and future Arctic SIC and sea ice thickness

pdSST-futBKSeasSIC.description: PA3.2: investigate response to sea ice in Barents and Kara Seas
pdSST-futBKSeasSIC.experiment: Atmosphere time slice with present day SST and future Barents and Kara Seas SIC

pdSST-futOkhotskSIC.description: PA3.1: investigate response to sea ice in Sea of Okhotsk
pdSST-futOkhotskSIC.experiment: Atmosphere time slice with present day SST and future Sea of Okhotsk SIC

pdSST-pdSIC.description: PA1.1: atmosphere only model present day control
pdSST-pdSIC.experiment: Atmosphere time slice with present day SST and SIC

pdSST-pdSICSIT.description: PA1.9: atmosphere only model present day control with sea ice thickness
pdSST-pdSICSIT.experiment: Atmosphere time slice constrained by present day conditions including sea ice thickness

pdSST-piAntSIC.description: PA1.7: investigate response to Antarctic sea ice and its role in polar amplification
pdSST-piAntSIC.experiment: Atmosphere time slice with present day SST and pre-industrial Antarctic SIC

pdSST-piArcSIC.description: PA1.5: investigate response to Arctic sea ice and its role in polar amplification
pdSST-piArcSIC.experiment: Atmosphere time slice with present day SST and pre-industrial Arctic SIC

piClim-2xDMS.description: 1850 control with doubled emissions of DMS
piClim-2xDMS.experiment: pre-industrial climatological SSTs and forcing, but with doubled emissions of DMS

piClim-2xNOx.description: 1850 control with doubled emissions of lightning NOx
piClim-2xNOx.experiment: pre-industrial climatological SSTs and forcing, but with doubled production of NOx due to lightning

piClim-2xVOC.description: 1850 control with doubled emissions of biogenic VOCs
piClim-2xVOC.experiment: pre-industrial climatological SSTs and forcing, but with doubled emissions of biogenic VOCs

piClim-2xdust.experiment: pre-industrial climatological SSTs and forcing, but with doubled emissions of dust

piClim-2xfire.description: 1850 control with doubled emissions of fires
piClim-2xfire.experiment: pre-industrial climatological SSTs and forcing, but with doubled emissions from fires

piClim-2xss.description: 1850 control with doubled sea salt emissions
piClim-2xss.experiment: pre-industrial climatological SSTs and forcing, but with doubled emissions of sea salt

piClim-BC.description: Perturbation from 1850 control using 2014 BC emissions
piClim-BC.experiment: pre-industrial climatological SSTs and forcing, but with 2014 black carbon emissions

piClim-CH4.description: Perturbation from 1850 control using 2014 CH4 concentrations
piClim-CH4.experiment: pre-industrial climatological SSTs and forcing, but with 2014 methane concentrations (including chemistry)

piClim-HC.description: Perturbation from 1850 control using 2014 halocarbon concentrations
piClim-HC.experiment: pre-industrial climatological SSTs and forcing, but with 2014 halocarbon concentrations (including chemistry)

piClim-N2O.description: Perturbation from 1850 control using 2014 N2O concentrations
piClim-N2O.experiment: pre-industrial climatological SSTs and forcing, but with 2014 N2O concentrations (including chemistry)

piClim-NH3.description: Perturbation from 1850 control using 2014 NH3 emissions
piClim-NH3.experiment: pre-industrial climatological SSTs and forcing, but with 2014 ammonia emissions

piClim-NOx.description: Perturbation from 1850 control using 2014 NOx emissions
piClim-NOx.experiment: pre-industrial climatological SSTs and forcing, but with 2014 NOx emissions

piClim-NTCF.description: Perturbation from 1850 control using 2014 aerosol and ozone precursor emissions
piClim-NTCF.experiment: pre-industrial climatological SSTs and forcing, but with 2014 NTCF emissions

piClim-O3.description: Perturbation from 1850 control using 2014 ozone precursor emissions
piClim-O3.experiment: pre-industrial climatological SSTs and forcing, but with 2014 ozone precursor emissions

piClim-OC.description: Perturbation from 1850 control using 2014 OC emissions
piClim-OC.experiment: pre-industrial climatological SSTs and forcing, but with 2014 organic carbon emissions

piClim-SO2.description: Perturbation from 1850 control using 2014 SO2 emissions
piClim-SO2.experiment: pre-industrial climatological SSTs and forcing, but with 2014 SO2 emissions

piClim-VOC.description: Perturbation from 1850 control using 2014 CO/VOC emissions
piClim-VOC.experiment: pre-industrial climatological SSTs and forcing, but with 2014 VOC emissions

piClim-aer.description: As in RFMIP-ERF-PI-Cntrl but with with present-day aerosols. Note that this experiment is considered to be tier 1 by RFMIP but tier 2 by AerChemMIP
piClim-aer.experiment: effective radiative forcing by present-day aerosols

piClim-anthro.description: As in RFMIP-ERF-PI-Cntrl but with present-day anthropogenic forcing (greenhouse gases, aerosols and land-use)
piClim-anthro.experiment: effective radiative forcing by present day anthropogenic agents

piClim-control.description: 30-year atmosphere only integration using preindustrial sea-surface temperature and sea-ice climatology. Interactive vegetation

piClim-ghg.description: As in RFMIP-ERF-PI-Cntrl but with present-day greenhouse gases
piClim-ghg.experiment: effective radiative forcing by present-day greenhouse gases

piClim-histaer.description: Time-varying forcing by aerosols. SST and sea ice fixed at preindustrial control. Interactive vegetation
piClim-histaer.experiment: transient effective radiative forcing by aerosols

piClim-histall.description: Time-varying forcing. SST and sea ice fixed at preindustrial control. Interactive vegetation

piClim-histghg.description: Time-varying forcing by GHGs. SST and sea ice fixed at preindustrial control. Interactive vegetation
piClim-histghg.experiment: transient effective radiative forcing by greenhouse gases

piClim-histnat.description: Time-varying forcing from volcanos, solar variability, etc. SST and sea ice fixed at preindustrial control. Interactive vegetation
piClim-histnat.experiment: transient effective radiative forcing by natural perturbations

piClim-lu.description: As in RFMIP-ERF-PI-Cntrl but with present-day land use
piClim-lu.experiment: effective radiative forcing by present-day land use

piClim-spAer-aer.description: Prescribed anthropogenic aerosol optical properties. Aerosol and ozone forcings
piClim-spAer-aer.experiment: effective radiative forcing at present day with specified anthropogenic aerosol optical properties, all forcings

piClim-spAer-anthro.description: Prescribed anthropogenic aerosol optical properties. Anthropogenic forcings
piClim-spAer-anthro.experiment: effective radiative forcing at present day with specified anthropogenic aerosol optical properties, anthropogenic forcings

piClim-spAer-histaer.description: Prescribed anthropogenic aerosol optical properties. Aerosol and ozone forcings
piClim-spAer-histaer.experiment: transient effective radiative forcing with specified anthropogenic aerosol optical properties, aerosol forcing

piClim-spAer-histall.description: Prescribed anthropogenic aerosol optical properties. Aerosol and ozone forcings
piClim-spAer-histall.experiment: transient effective radiative forcing with specified anthropogenic aerosol optical properties, all forcings

piControl-spinup.description: DECK: spin-up portion of the control

piControl-withism.description: Pre-industrial control simulation that includes interactive ice sheets
piControl-withism.experiment: preindustrial control with interactive ice sheet

piSST.description: An AGCM experiment with monthly-varying SSTs, sea-ice, atmospheric constituents and any other necessary boundary conditions (e.g. vegetation if required) taken from each model's own piControl run (using the 30 years of piControl that are parallel to years 111-140 of its abrupt-4xCO2 run). Dynamic vegetation should be turned off in all the piSST set of experiments
piSST.experiment: experiment forced with pre-industrial SSTs, sea ice and atmospheric constituents

piSST-4xCO2.description: Same as piSST but CO2 is quadrupled. The increase in CO2 is seen by both the radiation scheme and vegetation
piSST-4xCO2.experiment: as piSST with radiation and vegetation seeing 4xCO2

piSST-4xCO2-rad.description: Same as piSST but CO2 as seen by the radiation scheme is quadrupled

piSST-4xCO2-solar.description: Time slice at 1850 (picontrol) for G1ext to examine radiative forcing of abrupt-4xCO2
piSST-4xCO2-solar.experiment: preindustrial control SSTs with quadrupled CO2 and solar reduction

piSST-pdSIC.description: PA1.3: investigate role of SST in polar amplification
piSST-pdSIC.experiment: Atmosphere time slice with pre-industrial SST and present day SIC

piSST-piSIC.description: PA1.2: atmosphere only model pre-industrial control
piSST-piSIC.experiment: Atmosphere time slice with pre-industrial SST and SIC

piSST-pxK.description: Same as piSST, but with a spatially and temporally uniform SST anomaly applied on top of the monthly-varying piSST SSTs. The magnitude of the uniform increase is taken from each model's global, climatological annual mean SST change between abrupt-4xCO2 minus piControl (using the mean of years 111-140 of abrupt-4xCO2, and the parallel 30-year section of piControl)
piSST-pxK.experiment: as piSST with uniform SST increase with magnitude based on abrupt-4xCO2 response

rad-irf.experiment: offline assessment of radiative transfer parmeterizations in clear skies

spinup-1950.description: Coupled integration from ocean rest state using recommended HighResMIP protocol spinup, starting from 1950 ocean temperature and salinity analysis EN4, using constant 1950s forcing. At least 30 years to satisfy near surface quasi-equilibrium
spinup-1950.experiment: coupled spinup with fixed 1950s forcings from 1950 initial conditions (with ocean at rest) to provide initial condition for control-1950 and hist-1950

ssp119.description: Future scenario with low radiative forcing throughout reaching about 1.9 W/m2 in 2100 based on SSP1. Concentration-driven
ssp119.experiment: low-end scenario reaching 1.9 W m-2, based on SSP1

ssp126.description: Future scenario with low radiative forcing by the end of century. Following approximately RCP2.6 global forcing pathway but with new forcing based on SSP1. Concentration-driven. As a tier 2 option, this simulation should be extended to year 2300
ssp126.experiment: update of RCP2.6 based on SSP1

ssp126-ssp370Lu.description: Additional land use policy sensitivity simulation for low radiative forcing scenario, keep all forcings the same as ScenarioMIP SSP1-2.6 (afforestation scenario), but replace land use from SSP3-7 (afforestation) scenario; concentration-driven

ssp245.description: Future scenario with medium radiative forcing by the end of century. Following approximately RCP4.5 global forcing pathway but with new forcing based on SSP2. Concentration-driven
ssp245.experiment: update of RCP4.5 based on SSP2

ssp245-GHG.description: Extension of well-mixed GHG-only run under SSP2-4.5. Models with interactive chemistry schemes should either turn off the chemistry or use a preindustrial climatology of stratospheric and tropospheric ozone in their radiation schemes

ssp245-aer.description: Extension of aerosol-only run under SSP2-4.5

ssp245-nat.description: Extension of natural-only run under SSP2-4.5

ssp245-stratO3.description: Extension of stratospheric-ozone-only run under SSP2-4.5. In models with coupled chemistry, the chemistry scheme should be turned off, and the simulated ensemble mean monthly mean 3D stratospheric ozone concentrations from the SSP2-4.5 simulations should be prescribed. Tropospheric ozone should be fixed at 3D long-term monthly mean piControl values, with a value of 100 ppbv ozone concentration in this piControl climatology used to separate the troposphere from the stratosphere. In models without coupled chemistry the same stratospheric ozone prescribed in SSP2-4.5 should be prescribed. Stratospheric ozone concentrations will be provided by CCMI

ssp370.description: Future scenario with high radiative forcing by the end of century. Reaches about 7.0 W/m2 by 2100; fills gap in RCP forcing pathways between 6.0 and 8.5 W/m2. Concentration-driven
ssp370.experiment: gap-filling scenario reaching 7.0 based on SSP3

ssp370-lowNTCF.description: Future SSP3-7.0 with reduced NTCF emissions

ssp370-ssp126Lu.description: Additional land use policy sensitivity simulation for high radiative forcing scenario, keep all forcings the same as ScenarioMIP SSP3-7 (deforestation scenario), but replace land use from SSP1-2.6 (afforestation) scenario; concentration-driven

ssp370SST.description: Future SSP3-7.0, with SSTs prescribed from ssp370
ssp370SST.experiment: SSP3-7.0, with SSTs prescribed from ssp370

ssp370SST-lowAer.description: Future SSP3-7.0 with reduced aerosol emissions (from ssp370-lowNTCF), prescribed SSTs
ssp370SST-lowAer.experiment: SSP3-7.0, prescribed SSTs, with low aerosol emissions

ssp370SST-lowBC.description: Future SSP3-7.0 with reduced black carbon emissions, prescribed SSTs
ssp370SST-lowBC.experiment: SSP3-7.0, prescribed SSTs, with low black carbon emissions

ssp370SST-lowCH4.description: Future SSP3-7.0 with reduced CH4 concentrations, prescribed SSTs
ssp370SST-lowCH4.experiment: SSP3-7.0, prescribed SSTs, with low methane concentrations

ssp370SST-lowNTCF.description: Future SSP3-7.0 with reduced NTCF emissions, prescribed SSTs
ssp370SST-lowNTCF.experiment: SSP3-7.0, prescribed SSTs, with low NTCF emissions

ssp370SST-lowO3.description: Future SSP3-7.0 with reduced ozone precursor emissions (from ssp370-lowNTCF), prescribed SSTs
ssp370SST-lowO3.experiment: SSP3-7.0, prescribed SSTs, with low ozone precursor emissions

ssp370SST-ssp126Lu.description: Future SSP3-7.0 with low land use change (from ssp126), prescribed SSTs
ssp370SST-ssp126Lu.experiment: SSP3-7.0, prescribed SSTs, with SSP1-2.6 land use

ssp434.description: Future scenario with low radiative forcing by the end of century. Reaches about 3.4 W/m2 by 2100; fills gap in RCP forcing pathways between 4.5 and 2.6 W/m2. Concentration-driven
ssp434.experiment: gap-filling scenario reaching 3.4 based on SSP4

ssp460.description: Future scenario with medium radiative forcing by the end of century. Following approximately RCP6.0 global forcing pathway but with new forcing based on SSP4. Concentration-driven
ssp460.experiment: update of RCP6.0 based on SSP4

ssp534-over.description: 21st century overshoot scenario relative to SSP5_34. Branches from SSP5_85 at 2040 with emissions reduced to zero by 2070 and negative thereafter. This simulation should optionally be extended to year 2300
ssp534-over.experiment: overshoot of 3.4 W/m**2 branching from ssp585 in 2040

ssp534-over-bgc.description: This simulation should optionally be extended to year 2300
ssp534-over-bgc.experiment: biogeochemically-coupled version of the RCP3.4-overshoot based on SSP5

ssp585.description: Future scenario with high radiative forcing by the end of century. Following approximately RCP8.5 global forcing pathway but with new forcing based on SSP5. Concentration-driven. As a tier 2 option, this simulation should be extended to year 2300
ssp585.experiment: update of RCP8.5 based on SSP5

ssp585-bgc.description: Concentration-driven future scenario simulation, biogeochemically-coupled. This simulation should optionally be extended to year 2300
ssp585-bgc.experiment: biogeochemically-coupled version of the RCP8.5 based on SSP5

ssp585-withism.description: Future climate from ScenarioMIP SSP5-8.5 simulation that includes interactive ice sheets. Set up follows the standard SSP5-8.5 experiment

volc-cluster-21C.description: Parallel experiment to volc-cluster-ctrl, using restart files from the end of the historical simulation instead of from piControl, and boundary conditions from the 21st century SSP2-4.5 scenario experiment of ScenarioMIP
volc-cluster-21C.experiment: volcanic cluster experiment under 21st century SSP2-4.5 scenario

volc-cluster-ctrl.description: Early 19th century cluster of strong tropical volcanic eruptions, including the 1809 event of unknown location, the 1815 Tambora and 1835 Cosigueina eruptions. Experiment initialized from PiControl
volc-cluster-ctrl.experiment: 19th century volcanic cluster initialized from PiControl

volc-cluster-mill.description: Parallel experiment to volc-cluster-ctrl but with initial conditions taken from last millennium simulation to account for the effects of a more realistic history of past natural forcing. All forcings except volcanic kept constant from year AD 1790 on
volc-cluster-mill.experiment: 19th century volcanic cluster initialized from past1000

volc-long-eq.description: Idealized equatorial eruption corresponding to an initial emission of 56.2 Tg of SO2. The eruption magnitude corresponds to recent estimates for the 1815 Tambora eruption (Sigl et al., 2015), the largest historical tropical eruption, which was linked to the so-called "year without a summer" in 1816. Experiment initialized from PiControl
volc-long-eq.experiment: idealized equatorial volcanic eruption emitting 56.2 Tg SO2

volc-long-hlN.description: Idealized Northern Hemisphere high-latitude eruption emitting 28.1 Tg of SO2. Experiment initialized from PiControl
volc-long-hlN.experiment: idealized Northern Hemisphere high-latitude eruption emitting 28.1 Tg of SO2

volc-long-hlS.description: Idealized Southern Hemisphere high-latitude eruption emitting 28.1 Tg of SO2. Experiment initialized from PiControl
volc-long-hlS.experiment: Idealized Southern Hemisphere high-latitude eruption emitting 28.1 Tg of SO2

volc-pinatubo-full.description: 1991 Pinatubo forcing as used in the CMIP6 historical simulations. Requires special diagnostics of radiative and latent heating rates. A large number of ensemble members is required to address internal atmospheric variability

volc-pinatubo-slab.description: As volc-pinatubo-full, but with a slab ocean

volc-pinatubo-strat.description: As volc-pinatubo-full, but with prescribed perturbation to the total (LW+SW) radiative heating rates
volc-pinatubo-strat.experiment: Pinatubo experiment with partial radiative forcing, includes only stratospheric warming

volc-pinatubo-surf.description: As volc-pinatubo-full, but with prescribed perturbation to the shortwave flux to mimic the attenuation of solar radiation by volcanic aerosols
volc-pinatubo-surf.experiment: Pinatubo experiment with partial radiative forcing, solar radiation scattering only

yr2010CO2.description: Branch from beginning of year 2010 of the historical simulation with CO2 concentration and all other forcing held fixed at 2010 level (part of the CDR-yr2010-pulse experiment to diagnose CO2 emissions)
